ProductInfo.Features:
GW3008HD: High-End 8 Channel H.264 960H/FD1 DVR with HDMI & VGA. FD1/CIF/960H/Q960H recording, 8ch 960H Full Channels Real-time Playback . iPhone, Android Viewing, PTZ Control
GW808H: 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Outdoor Camera, 1000 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Varifocal Lens, 42PCS Infrared LED, 114 feet IR Distance. 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination. Metal vandal proof & water proof
Package Includes: GW3008HD DVR with 2TB HDD; GWLED19IN - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor; 6 x GW808H - 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Outdoor/Indoor water proof Camera
1 x GW125CAW: 125 feet pre-made cable BNC;1 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC;3 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC;1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC;1 x 12V5A Power Supply For Security Cameras;1 x 1 to 8 Power Splitter Adapter Cable
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 6CHE10 8 Channel H.264 960H/FD1 DVR with 6 x 1000TVL SONY CMOS Outdoor Security Camera Varifocal Lens CCTV System, Free Monitor (White/Black)
